page.title: 19TOTTON'S THREE SCORE CLUB
page.content: The Three Score Club is open most days of the week,on Saturdays it is let out for shows. The yearly subscription is Â£2.00. They have four holidays a year two in a holiday camp and two in a hotel. They also have a lot of days out. Tea, coffee and biscuits are supplied at the club. They play snooker, bingo, whist, solo whist and they do dancing at night. All the members are over sixty. The oldest members are in their nineties. Some people do art there and they have an art exhibition. At the Three Score Club they also have concerts at Christmas and Easter. There are about five hundred members. There is a very friendly atmosphere. It is in the centre of Totton so it is easily accessible.The members run the club themselves and elect their own committee.
